Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It speeds the process up as you can move on with tasks and learning a lot quicker than waiting for supervisors to respond.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yes, it feels very safe an non-judgemental to use AI. if you don't understand, you can ask for further clarifications and elaborations. You can ask Ai to tailor the language, for example to an undergraduate degree level. Academics often lack the ability to communicate concepts in a simple and understandable way
